alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:34PM MDT until March 30 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow with total accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, mainly on the crest and west facing slopes. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...6 PM Wednesday to 11 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult across South Pass. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is likely to fall during the first half of Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
